ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: If you get the message that you Fell to the ground , you failed.  Get up and try again.  I noticed that it really started working around 70 or 80.  At 115, it
ygData.messageBody:
If you get the message that you "Fell to the ground", you failed. Get
up and try again. I noticed that it really started working around 70 or
80. At 115, it works virtually every time, and has saved me dozens of
times.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Seth Young [SMTP:lambastic@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 2:00 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death Skill
>
> From: Seth Young <lambastic@...>
>
> Has anyone ever found the feign death skill to be actually useful in
> getting
> creatures that are attacking you to stop? I have been practicing
> non-stop
> since I got the skill and it is now at 50, but fighting crocodiles and
>
> caiman, not once has feigning death, whether i fell to the ground or
> not,
> stopped them from biting me. Is there something about the use of the
> skill
> that I am missing or is it just not that useful?
>
>
> _______________________________________________________________
